The stroke at the bottom represents his feet, one foot pointing in each direction. The two vertical strokes that make a V shape represent his legs and torso. The äº  lid component at the top is actually his wide shoulders, with the topmost drop being his head. This ç«‹ guard stands perfectly still, staring at us.îª±îª²FOUND IN îª³å•† shÄng salesman, æ–° xÄ«n new, ç«™ zhÃ n station, æ¥ jiÄ“ welcome, æ‹‰ lÄ pull, ä½ wÃ¨i position, é¢œ yÃ¡n countenance, äº§ chÇn products, ç«‹ lÃ¬ stand, äº² qÄ«n relative, ç«  zhÄng chapter, åƒ lÄ garbage, ç«¥ tÃ³ng child, ç« jÃ¬ng compete, æ’ zhuÃ ng bump into, å¸ dÃ¬ supreme ruler, ç«¯ duÄn upright, å•¦ la exclamation, è–ª xÄ«n fuel, éšœ zhÃ ng barrier, é“² chÇn shovel, è’‚ dÃ¬ stem, ç¼” dÃ¬ conclude, ç«­ jiÃ© use up, ç«£ jÃ¹n complete, ç²’ lÃ¬ grain, æ³£ qÃ¬ weep, è¨ sÃ  sa, ç«– shÃ¹ vertical, æ¯… yÃ¬ resolute, å½° zhÄng conspicuous, å¹¢ chuÃ¡ng building, å•¼ tÃ­ weep aloud, é»¯ Ã n dim, è¹„ tÃ­ hoof, é– jÃ¬ng pacifyîª±îª²RANK îª³láº­pîª±îª²HSK îª³1îª±îª²TÃŠN îª³báº£o vá»‡îª±îª²HÃN VIá»†T îª³láº­p
